messages.title: Why I am backing Chantal Lee
messages.content: I work for a health and safety lobbying organisation and healthcare is top of my concerns. I am backing Chantal Lee for the Newark constituency because I know she won’t privatise the NHS like the Tories.

messages.title: Will your family have a home tomorrow?
messages.content: When our children’s children buy a home they will be the penthouse flats being built by London developers cashing in on the air rights above the city's rooftops.

messages.title: A Tory Brexit is a road to nowhere
messages.content: A Tory Brexit will be catastrophic for the people of Newark. The single biggest economic shock to the UK economy since the war, will lead to huge GDP shrinkage, collapsing growth, mass unemployment, recession and a general economic depression not seen since the 1930s by middle England. We need to stop this happening now.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Tory Brexit is catastrophic for the UK economy and leads to mass unemployment, recession, and economic depression.
Support for the NHS, opposing privatization, and addressing high death rates caused by Tory cuts.
Addressing housing issues, opposing developers cashing in on air rights in London.

issues.health: Conservatives have slashed NHS spending leading to high death rates. Newark Hospital is slammed by Care Quality Commission.
